id.description: The unique identifier for the artist or band

name.description: The name of the artist or band

dateAdded.description: Date this artist was added to the database (ISO 8601 UTC format)

dateUpdated.description: Date this entry was last updated (ISO 8601 UTC format), or null if never updated

disclosure.description: Whether the artist has self-disclosed AI usage: confirmed = yes without context, full = fully AI-generated, partial = uses AI for parts of their process, none = no disclosure

disclosureNotes.description: Additional details for the disclosure value, or null if no details provided

disclosureTypes.description: Types of AI usage in the artist's music production

markerNotes.description: Additional details for the markers value, or null if no details provided

genres.description: Spotify genres associated with the artist

popularity.description: Spotify popularity score (0-100), or null if not available

followers.description: Spotify followers count, or null if not available

shScore.description: SubmitHub's AI probability score (averaged across an artists 3 most recent popular tracks on Spotify)

spotify.description: Spotify artist ID, or null if not available

apple.description: Apple Music artist ID, or null if not available

amazon.description: Amazon profile ID, or null if not available

youtube.description: YouTube channel ID (starting with UC), or null if not available

tiktok.description: TikTok profile handle, or null if not available

instagram.description: Instagram profile handle, or null if not available
